class.name: AddOnManager
class.summary: This class handles the loading of themes/plugins or other add-ons and their language packs.
class.description: This class handles the loading of themes/plugins or other add-ons and their language packs.

event.name: onAdd
event.summary: Fires when a item is added.
event.description: Fires when a item is added.

method.name: get
method.summary: Returns the specified add on by the short name.
method.description: Returns the specified add on by the short name.

param.name: n
param.description: Add-on to look for.

return.description: Theme or plugin add-on instance or undefined.

method.name: requireLangPack
method.summary: Loads a language pack for the specified add-on.
method.description: Loads a language pack for the specified add-on.

param.name: n
param.description: Short name of the add-on.

method.name: add
method.summary: Adds a instance of the add-on by it's short name.
method.description: Adds a instance of the add-on by it's short name.

param.name: id
param.description: Short name/id for the add-on.

param.name: o
param.description: Theme or plugin to add.

return.description: The same theme or plugin instance that got passed in.

method.name: load
method.summary: Loads an add-on from a specific url.
method.description: Loads an add-on from a specific url.

param.name: n
param.description: Short name of the add-on that gets loaded.

param.name: u
param.description: URL to the add-on that will get loaded.

param.name: cb
param.description: Optional callback to execute ones the add-on is loaded.

param.name: s
param.description: Optional scope to execute the callback in.

class.name: ControlManager
class.summary: This class is responsible for managing UI control instances.
class.description: This class is responsible for managing UI control instances. It's both a factory and a collection for the controls.

method.name: ControlManager
method.summary: Constructs a new control manager instance.
method.description: Constructs a new control manager instance. Consult the Wiki for more details on this class.

param.name: ed
param.description: TinyMCE editor instance to add the control to.

param.name: s
param.description: Optional settings object for the control manager.

method.name: get
method.summary: Returns a control by id or undefined it it wasn't found.
method.description: Returns a control by id or undefined it it wasn't found.

param.name: id
param.description: Control instance name.

return.description: Control instance or undefined.

method.name: setActive
method.summary: Sets the active state of a control by id.
method.description: Sets the active state of a control by id.

param.name: id
param.description: Control id to set state on.

param.name: s
param.description: Active state true/false.

return.description: Control instance that got activated or null if it wasn't found.

method.name: setDisabled
method.summary: Sets the dsiabled state of a control by id.
method.description: Sets the dsiabled state of a control by id.

param.name: id
param.description: Control id to set state on.

param.name: s
param.description: Active state true/false.

return.description: Control instance that got disabled or null if it wasn't found.

method.name: add
method.summary: Adds a control to the control collection inside the manager.
method.description: Adds a control to the control collection inside the manager.

param.name: Control
param.description: instance to add to collection.

return.description: Control instance that got passed in.

method.name: createControl
method.summary: Creates a control by name, when a control is created it will automatically add it to the control collection.
method.description: Creates a control by name, when a control is created it will automatically add it to the control collection. It first ask all plugins for the specified control if the plugins didn't return a control then the default behavior will be used.

param.name: n
param.description: Control name to create for example "separator".

return.description: Control instance that got created and added.

method.name: createDropMenu
method.summary: Creates a drop menu control instance by id.
method.description: Creates a drop menu control instance by id.

param.name: id
param.description: Unique id for the new dropdown instance. For example "some menu".

param.name: s
param.description: Optional settings object for the control.

param.name: cc
param.description: Optional control class to use instead of the default one.

return.description: Control instance that got created and added.

method.name: createListBox
method.summary: Creates a list box control instance by id.
method.description: Creates a list box control instance by id. A list box is either a native select element or a DOM/JS based list box control. This depends on the use_native_selects settings state.

param.name: id
param.description: Unique id for the new listbox instance. For example "styles".

param.name: s
param.description: Optional settings object for the control.

param.name: cc
param.description: Optional control class to use instead of the default one.

return.description: Control instance that got created and added.

method.description: Creates a button control instance by id.

param.description: Unique id for the new button instance. For example "bold".

param.name: s
param.description: Optional settings object for the control.

param.name: cc
param.description: Optional control class to use instead of the default one.

return.description: Control instance that got created and added.

param.name: cc

method.name: init
method.summary: Initializes the editor this will be called automatically when all plugins/themes and language packs are loaded by the re...
method.description: Initializes the editor this will be called automatically when all plugins/themes and language packs are loaded by the rendered method. This method will setup the iframe and create the theme and plugin instances.

property.summary: Reference to the theme instance that was used to generate the UI.
property.description: Reference to the theme instance that was used to generate the UI.

property.summary: Undo manager instance, responsible for handling undo levels.
property.description: Undo manager instance, responsible for handling undo levels.

method.summary: This method get called by the init method ones the iframe is loaded.
method.description: This method get called by the init method ones the iframe is loaded. It will fill the iframe with contents, setups DOM and selection objects for the iframe. This method should not be called directly.

property.description: DOM instance for the editor.

method.description: Sets up the contentEditable mode.

method.name: focus
method.summary: Focuses/activates the editor.
method.description: Focuses/activates the editor. This will set this editor as the activeEditor in the EditorManager it will also place DOM focus inside the editor.

param.name: sf
param.description: Skip DOM focus. Just set is as the active editor.

method.name: execCallback
method.summary: Executes a legacy callback.
method.description: Executes a legacy callback. This method is useful to call old 2.x option callbacks. There new event model is a better way to add callback so this method might be removed in the future.

param.name: n
param.description: Name of the callback to execute.

return.description: Return value passed from callback function.

method.summary: Translates the specified string by replacing variables with language pack items it will also check if there is a key mat...
method.description: Translates the specified string by replacing variables with language pack items it will also check if there is a key mathcin the input.

param.name: s
param.description: String to translate by the language pack data.

return.description: Translated string.

method.summary: Returns a language pack item by name/key.
method.description: Returns a language pack item by name/key.

param.name: n
param.description: Name/key to get from the language pack.

method.description: Returns a configuration parameter by name.

param.name: dv

return.description: Configuration parameter value or default value.

method.summary: Distpaches out a onNodeChange event to all observers.
method.description: Distpaches out a onNodeChange event to all observers. This method should be called when you need to update the UI states or element path etc.

param.name: o
param.description: Optional object to pass along for the node changed event.

method.name: addButton
method.summary: Adds a button that later gets created by the ControlManager.
method.description: Adds a button that later gets created by the ControlManager. This is a shorter and easier method of adding buttons without the need to deal with the ControlManager directly. But it's also less powerfull if you need more control use the ControlManagers factory methods instead.

param.name: n
param.description: Button name to add.

param.name: s
param.description: Settings object with title, cmd etc.

method.name: addCommand
method.summary: Adds a custom command to the editor, you can also override existing commands with this method.
method.description: Adds a custom command to the editor, you can also override existing commands with this method. The command that you add can be executed with execCommand.

param.name: n
param.description: Command name to add/override.

param.name: f
param.description: Function to execute when the command occurs.

param.name: s
param.description: Optional scope to execute the function in.

method.name: addQueryStateHandler
method.summary: Adds a custom query state command to the editor, you can also override existing commands with this method.
method.description: Adds a custom query state command to the editor, you can also override existing commands with this method. The command that you add can be executed with queryCommandState function.

param.name: n
param.description: Command name to add/override.

param.name: f
param.description: Function to execute when the command state retrival occurs.

param.name: s
param.description: Optional scope to execute the function in.

method.name: addQueryValueHandler
method.summary: Adds a custom query value command to the editor, you can also override existing commands with this method.
method.description: Adds a custom query value command to the editor, you can also override existing commands with this method. The command that you add can be executed with queryCommandValue function.

param.name: n
param.description: Command name to add/override.

param.name: f
param.description: Function to execute when the command value retrival occurs.

param.name: s
param.description: Optional scope to execute the function in.

method.name: addShortcut
method.summary: Adds a keyboard shortcut for some command or function.
method.description: Adds a keyboard shortcut for some command or function.

param.name: pa
param.description: Shortcut pattern. Like for example: ctrl+alt+o.

param.name: desc
param.description: Text description for the command.

param.name: cmd_func
param.description: Command name string or function to execute when the key is pressed.

param.name: sc
param.description: Optional scope to execute the function in.

return.description: true/false state if the shortcut was added or not.

method.name: execCommand
method.summary: Executes a command on the current instance.
method.description: Executes a command on the current instance. These commands can be TinyMCE internal commands prefixed with "mce" or they can be build in browser commands such as "Bold". A compleate list of browser commands is available on MSDN or Mozilla.org. This function will dispatch the execCommand function on each plugin, theme or the execcommand_callback option if none of these return true it will handle the command as a internal browser command.

param.name: cmd
param.description: Command name to execute, for example mceLink or Bold.

param.name: ui
param.description: True/false state if a UI (dialog) should be presented or not.

param.name: val
param.description: Optional command value, this can be anything.

param.name: a
param.description: Optional arguments object.

return.description: True/false if the command was executed or not.

method.name: queryCommandState
method.summary: Returns a command specific state, for example if bold is enabled or not.
method.description: Returns a command specific state, for example if bold is enabled or not.

param.name: c
param.description: Command to query state from.

return.description: Command specific state, for example if bold is enabled or not.

method.name: queryCommandValue
method.summary: Returns a command specific value, for example the current font size.
method.description: Returns a command specific value, for example the current font size.

param.name: c
param.description: Command to query value from.

return.description: Command specific value, for example the current font size.

method.name: show
method.summary: Shows the editor and hides any textarea/div that the editor is supposed to replace.
method.description: Shows the editor and hides any textarea/div that the editor is supposed to replace.

method.name: hide
method.summary: Hides the editor and shows any textarea/div that the editor is supposed to replace.
method.description: Hides the editor and shows any textarea/div that the editor is supposed to replace.

method.name: isHidden
method.summary: Returns true/false if the editor is hidden or not.
method.description: Returns true/false if the editor is hidden or not.

return.description: True/false if the editor is hidden or not.

method.name: setProgressState
method.summary: Sets the progress state, this will display a throbber/progess for the editor.
method.description: Sets the progress state, this will display a throbber/progess for the editor. This is ideal for asycronous operations like an AJAX save call.

param.name: b
param.description: Boolean state if the progress should be shown or hidden.

param.name: ti
param.description: Optional time to wait before the progress gets shown.

param.name: o
param.description: Optional object to pass to the progress observers.

return.description: Same as the input state.

method.name: load
method.summary: Loads contents from the textarea or div element that got converted into an editor instance.
method.description: Loads contents from the textarea or div element that got converted into an editor instance. This method will move the contents from that textarea or div into the editor by using setContent so all events etc that method has will get dispatched as well.

param.name: o
param.description: Optional content object, this gets passed around through the whole load process.

return.description: HTML string that got set into the editor.

method.name: save
method.summary: Saves the contents from a editor out to the textarea or div element that got converted into an editor instance.
method.description: Saves the contents from a editor out to the textarea or div element that got converted into an editor instance. This method will move the HTML contents from the editor into that textarea or div by getContent so all events etc that method has will get dispatched as well.

param.name: o
param.description: Optional content object, this gets passed around through the whole save process.

return.description: HTML string that got set into the textarea/div.

method.name: setContent
method.summary: Sets the specified content to the editor instance, this will cleanup the content before it gets set using the different ...
method.description: Sets the specified content to the editor instance, this will cleanup the content before it gets set using the different cleanup rules options.

param.name: h
param.description: Content to set to editor, normally HTML contents but can be other formats as well.

param.name: o
param.description: Optional content object, this gets passed around through the whole set process.

return.description: HTML string that got set into the editor.

method.name: getContent
method.summary: Gets the content from the editor instance, this will cleanup the content before it gets returned using the different cle...
method.description: Gets the content from the editor instance, this will cleanup the content before it gets returned using the different cleanup rules options.

Splits an element into two new elements and places the specified split element or element between the new ones. For example splitting the paragraph at the bold element in this example

abcabc123

would produce

abc

abc

123

.

method.summary: Will executed the specified string when the page has been loaded.
method.description: Will executed the specified string when the page has been loaded. This function was added for compatibility with the 2.x branch.

param.name: s
param.description: String to evalutate on init.

method.name: storeSelection
method.summary: Stores the current editor selection for later restoration.
method.description: Stores the current editor selection for later restoration. This can be useful since some browsers looses it's selection if a control element is selected/focused inside the dialogs.

method.name: restoreSelection
method.summary: Restores any stored selection.
method.description: Restores any stored selection. This can be useful since some browsers looses it's selection if a control element is selected/focused inside the dialogs.

method.name: requireLangPack
method.summary: Loads a specific dialog language pack.
method.description: Loads a specific dialog language pack. If you pass in plugin_url as a arugment when you open the window it will load the <plugin url>/langs/<code>_dlg.js lang pack file.

method.name: pickColor
method.summary: Executes a color picker on the specified element id.
method.description: Executes a color picker on the specified element id. When the user then selects a color it will be set as the value of the specified element.

param.name: e
param.description: DOM event object.

param.name: element_id
param.description: Element id to be filled with the color value from the picker.

method.name: openBrowser
method.summary: Opens a filebrowser/imagebrowser this will set the output value from the browser as a value on the specified element.
method.description: Opens a filebrowser/imagebrowser this will set the output value from the browser as a value on the specified element.

param.name: element_id
param.description: Id of the element to set value in.

param.name: type
param.description: Type of browser to open image/file/flash.

param.name: option
param.description: Option name to get the file_broswer_callback function name from.

method.name: confirm
method.summary: Creates a confirm dialog.
method.description: Creates a confirm dialog. Please don't use the blocking behavior of this native version use the callback method instead then it can be extended.

param.name: t
param.description: Title for the new confirm dialog.

param.name: cb
param.description: Callback function to be executed after the user has selected ok or cancel.

param.name: s
param.description: Optional scope to execute the callback in.

method.name: alert
method.summary: Creates a alert dialog.
method.description: Creates a alert dialog. Please don't use the blocking behavior of this native version use the callback method instead then it can be extended.

param.name: t
param.description: Title for the new alert dialog.

param.name: cb
param.description: Callback function to be executed after the user has selected ok.

param.name: s
param.description: Optional scope to execute the callback in.

method.name: close
method.summary: Closes the current window.
method.description: Closes the current window.

class.name: tinymce
class.summary: Core namespace with core functionality for the TinyMCE API all sub classes will be added to this namespace/object.
class.description: Core namespace with core functionality for the TinyMCE API all sub classes will be added to this namespace/object.

property.name: isOpera
property.summary: Constant that is true if the browser is Opera.
property.description: Constant that is true if the browser is Opera.

property.name: isWebKit
property.summary: Constant that is true if the browser is WebKit (Safari/Chrome).
property.description: Constant that is true if the browser is WebKit (Safari/Chrome).

property.name: isIE
property.summary: Constant that is true if the browser is IE.
property.description: Constant that is true if the browser is IE.

property.name: isIE6
property.summary: Constant that is true if the browser is IE 6 or older.
property.description: Constant that is true if the browser is IE 6 or older.

property.name: isGecko
property.summary: Constant that is true if the browser is Gecko.
property.description: Constant that is true if the browser is Gecko.

property.name: isMac
property.summary: Constant that is true if the os is Mac OS.
property.description: Constant that is true if the os is Mac OS.

property.name: isAir
property.summary: Constant that is true if the runtime is Adobe Air.
property.description: Constant that is true if the runtime is Adobe Air.

method.name: is
method.summary: Checks if a object is of a specific type for example an array.
method.description: Checks if a object is of a specific type for example an array.

param.name: o
param.description: Object to check type of.

param.name: t
param.description: Optional type to check for.

return.description: true/false if the object is of the specified type.

method.name: each
method.summary: Performs an iteration of all items in a collection such as an object or array.
method.description: Performs an iteration of all items in a collection such as an object or array. This method will execure the callback function for each item in the collection, if the callback returns false the iteration will terminate. The callback has the following format: cb(value, key_or_index).

param.name: o
param.description: Collection to iterate.

param.name: cb
param.description: Callback function to execute for each item.

param.name: s
param.description: Optional scope to execute the callback in.

method.name: map
method.summary: Creates a new array by the return value of each iteration function call.
method.description: Creates a new array by the return value of each iteration function call. This enables you to convert one array list into another.

param.name: a
param.description: Array of items to iterate.

param.name: f
param.description: Function to call for each item. It's return value will be the new value.

return.description: Array with new values based on function return values.

method.name: grep
method.summary: Filters out items from the input array by calling the specified function for each item.
method.description: Filters out items from the input array by calling the specified function for each item. If the function returns false the item will be excluded if it returns true it will be included.

param.name: a
param.description: Array of items to loop though.

param.name: f
param.description: Function to call for each item. Include/exclude depends on it's return value.

return.description: New array with values imported and filtered based in input.

method.name: inArray
method.summary: Returns the index of a value in an array, this method will return -1 if the item wasn't found.
method.description: Returns the index of a value in an array, this method will return -1 if the item wasn't found.

param.name: a
param.description: Array/Object to search for value in.

param.name: v
param.description: Value to check for inside the array.

return.description: Index of item inside the array inside an object. Or -1 if it wasn't found.

method.name: extend
method.summary: Extends an object with the specified other object(s).
method.description: Extends an object with the specified other object(s).

param.name: o
param.description: Object to extend with new items.

param.name: e..n
param.description: Object(s) to extend the specified object with.

return.description: o New extended object, same reference as the input object.

method.name: trim
method.summary: Removes whitespace from the beginning and end of a string.
method.description: Removes whitespace from the beginning and end of a string.

param.name: s
param.description: String to remove whitespace from.

return.description: New string with removed whitespace.

method.name: create
method.summary: Creates a class, subclass or static singleton.
method.description: Creates a class, subclass or static singleton. More details on this method can be found in the Wiki.

param.name: s
param.description: Class name, inheritage and prefix.

param.name: o
param.description: Collection of methods to add to the class.

method.name: walk
method.summary: Executed the specified function for each item in a object tree.
method.description: Executed the specified function for each item in a object tree.

param.name: o
param.description: Object tree to walk though.

param.name: f
param.description: Function to call for each item.

param.name: n
param.description: Optional name of collection inside the objects to walk for example childNodes.

param.name: s
param.description: Optional scope to execute the function in.

method.name: createNS
method.summary: Creates a namespace on a specific object.
method.description: Creates a namespace on a specific object.

param.name: n
param.description: Namespace to create for example a.b.c.d.

param.name: o
param.description: Optional object to add namespace to, defaults to window.

return.description: New namespace object the last item in path.

method.name: resolve
method.summary: Resolves a string and returns the object from a specific structure.
method.description: Resolves a string and returns the object from a specific structure.

param.name: n
param.description: Path to resolve for example a.b.c.d.

param.name: o
param.description: Optional object to search though, defaults to window.

return.description: Last object in path or null if it couldn't be resolved.

method.name: addUnload
method.summary: Adds an unload handler to the document.
method.description: Adds an unload handler to the document. This handler will be executed when the document gets unloaded. This method is useful for dealing with browser memory leaks where it might be vital to remove DOM references etc.

param.name: f
param.description: Function to execute before the document gets unloaded.

param.name: s
param.description: Optional scope to execute the function in.

return.description: Returns the specified unload handler function.

method.name: removeUnload
method.summary: Removes the specified function form the unload handler list.
method.description: Removes the specified function form the unload handler list.

param.name: f
param.description: Function to remove from unload handler list.

return.description: Removed function name or null if it wasn't found.

method.name: explode
method.summary: Splits a string but removes the whitespace before and after each value.
method.description: Splits a string but removes the whitespace before and after each value.

param.name: s
param.description: String to split.

param.name: d
param.description: Delimiter to split by.

property.name: tinyMCE
property.summary: Shorter version of tinymce.
property.description: Shorter version of tinymce.EditorManager also added for 2.x compatibility.
